page.title: 05Railways and Farmland
page.content: {Railway.}In the north west corner of our rectangle we found a dismantled railway in a cutting.It was overgrown with trees and bushes.It looked as if it was being used as a public footpath.{Pond.} Along the Ashdon Road we found a pond covered in weed.{ {St.Aylots}is a moated farmhouse believed to have been built in the 15th century.{Redgates Farm} is derelict and the doors and windows have been boarded up.The house is to be renovated.Giant hogweed was growing in the yard.{Farmland. }Tic beans and wheat were growing in the surrounding fields.
